## Registry

- [Registry Overview](https://ui.shadcn.com/docs/registry.md): Creating and publishing your own component registry.
- [Getting Started](https://ui.shadcn.com/docs/registry/getting-started.md): Set up your own registry.
- [Examples](https://ui.shadcn.com/docs/registry/examples.md): Example registries.
- [FAQ](https://ui.shadcn.com/docs/registry/faq.md): Common questions about registries.
- [Authentication](https://ui.shadcn.com/docs/registry/authentication.md): Adding authentication to your registry.
- [Registry MCP](https://ui.shadcn.com/docs/registry/mcp.md): MCP integration for registries.
